patthana17.21:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:1.1_6: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:2.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:3.1_0: Hetuyā cuddasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana17.21:4.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:5.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:6.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:8.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.21:9.1_0: Ārammaṇe ekavīsati, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe…
patthana17.21:9.1_2: (Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlampi kātabbaṁ.)
